official-title.#text: To amend title 4, United States Code, to authorize members of the Armed Forces not in uniform and veterans to render a military salute during the recitation of the pledge of allegiance.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , is amended by adding at the end the following new sentence:

quote.#text: Members of the Armed Forces not in uniform and veterans may render the military salute in the manner provided for persons in uniform.

header.#text: Military salute during recitation of pledge of allegiance by members of the Armed Forces not in uniform and by veterans

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2284 IH: To amend title 4, United States Code, to authorize members of the Armed Forces not in uniform and veterans to render a military salute during the recitation of the pledge of allegiance.
